headline: KLA (KLAC) Announces Q4 Earnings Growth With Revenue Surpassing US$3 Billion
summary: KLA (KLAC) recently reported strong financial results for the fourth quarter, with revenue reaching $3.2 billion and net income improving to $1.2 billion, up notably from the previous year. The company's positive earnings trends, highlighted by a significant increase in both basic and diluted EPS, likely contributed to its stock price surge of 26% over the last quarter. Indeed, the broader market had posted solid gains, buoyed by optimism about strong corporate earnings, which KLA's results...

headline: UBS and Barclays Raise PT on KLA Corporation (KLAC)
summary: KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) is included in our list of the 12 Unstoppable Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks to Buy Right Now. Maintaining a ‘Neutral’ rating, UBS raised its price target on KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) from $775 to $960 on July 21, 2025. The investment firm expects the company’s Q4 revenue to meet guidance and Q1 revenue […]

headline: Dow Jones Futures Fall On Global Trump Tariff Hikes, Amazon Earnings; Jobs Report Due
summary: Futures fell as President Trump hikes tariffs on dozens of countries and Amazon tumbles on earnings. Apple, Reddit were notable earnings movers too. The jobs report looms.

headline: KLA Corp (KLAC) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Record Free Cash Flow and Dividend Increase ...
summary: KLA Corp (KLAC) surpasses revenue and EPS guidance, announces a new $5 billion share repurchase authorization, and anticipates growth in advanced packaging systems.

headline: Dow Jones Futures: Amazon, Apple, Reddit Are Earnings Movers, Trump Hikes Canada Tariffs; Jobs Report Due
summary: Dow Jones futures: Amazon, Apple and Reddit moved late on earnings while President Trump hiked Canada tariffs. The jobs report looms.
